meanings.definition: The quality or state of being plump.
meanings.sent1: Her cheeks had a noticeable plumpness to them.
meanings.sent2: The baby's plumpness made everyone smile.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's exaggerated plumpness added to the humor of the show.
meanings.sent4: The plumpness of the ripe peach was a delight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The plumpness of the pillow made it extra comfortable to rest on.

meanings.definition: The condition of having a full, rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: The pumpkin's plumpness made it perfect for carving.
meanings.sent2: The teddy bear's plumpness made it huggable and cuddly.
meanings.sent3: The plumpness of the snowman's belly made him look jolly.
meanings.sent4: The plumpness of the clouds signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The plumpness of the grapes indicated they were ready to be picked.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being pleasantly fat or well-rounded.
meanings.sent1: The cat's plumpness made it a favorite among the neighborhood kids.
meanings.sent2: Grandma's baking always resulted in delicious treats with just the right amount of plumpness.
meanings.sent3: The plumpness of the squirrel made it a comical sight as it scurried up the tree.
meanings.sent4: The plumpness of the robin's red breast stood out against the green leaves.
meanings.sent5: The plumpness of the puppy's belly made it irresistible for belly rubs.
